note: I am a “reluctant mystic”. No theology degrees, no ordinations, no career as a minister. Just a calling to build a home for LGBQT+ people to reclaim their faith. I am the creator of the Framework of Faith™, founder of the Center for Queer Theology, a sought-after speaker with my keynote, “Broken No More”, and I continue to go where my calling takes me. I live in NYC with my husband Roy.
